title: 70 Undeniably Brilliant Gift Ideas for Every Man in Your Life
description: Something for your husband, brothers, and nephews at every price point.
excerpt: Find something for your husband, brothers, and nephews at every price point in our edit of the best gift ideas for men, which is curated by editors and top reviews.
text: Legendary Whitetails Standard Buck Camp Flannel ShirtGet him ready for the season with a classic shirt that can be dressed up or dressed down.UGG Tasman Leather Winter Mule SlippersOne of the most popular gifts to give is a timeless pair of Ugg slippers. This leather pair is the perfect gift for any dapper man.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPrada Stainless Steel Insulated Water BottleStaying hydrated has never been fancier, thanks to Prada’s take on the stainless-steel tumbler.Burberry Check Cashmere Scarf’Tis the season to stay warm and cozy. Burberry’s timeless scarf is the instantly recognizable accessory that will put a smile on his face this year.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMichael Kors Slim Runway Black Watch MK8507With black-on-black details, this is the elegant watch that will whisper chic in his jewelry collection.Gucci Rib Knit Wool HatIs he always complaining about how cold he is? Here’s a fancy beanie that he’ll gladly wear every day this winter.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowViking Revolution Solid ColognesGood things come in small packages. It’s a fun game that will turn any party into an amusing evening.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBalenciaga Ledger Stax™ Holder in BlackIf he’s always misplacing his keys, he’ll never let Balenciaga’s keychain, adorned with the Eiffel Tower and a money holder, out of his sight.Dents Cambridge Cashmere Lined Deerskin GlovesWith these sleek leather gloves, he’ll feel just as suave as James Bond.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowJ.Crew Brushed Wool V-Neck SweaterA cheerful sweater always makes for the perfect gift. html:
Legendary Whitetails Standard Buck Camp Flannel Shirt

Get him ready for the season with a classic shirt that can be dressed up or dressed down.

UGG Tasman Leather Winter Mule Slippers

One of the most popular gifts to give is a timeless pair of Ugg slippers. This leather pair is the perfect gift for any dapper man.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Prada Stainless Steel Insulated Water Bottle

Staying hydrated has never been fancier, thanks to Prada’s take on the stainless-steel tumbler.

Burberry Check Cashmere Scarf

’Tis the season to stay warm and cozy. Burberry’s timeless scarf is the instantly recognizable accessory that will put a smile on his face this year.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Michael Kors Slim Runway Black Watch MK8507

With black-on-black details, this is the elegant watch that will whisper chic in his jewelry collection.

Gucci Rib Knit Wool Hat

Is he always complaining about how cold he is? Here’s a fancy beanie that he’ll gladly wear every day this winter.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Viking Revolution Solid Colognes

Good things come in small packages. This set will allow him to experience the intoxicating scents of four colognes at a fraction of the price.

Crosley Radio C62 Record Player with Speakers

If he’s nostalgic for simpler times, Crosley’s record player will take him back to the good ol’ days.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Williams Sonoma Fresca Italian Pasta Night Gift Crate

Foodies will drool when they open this gourmet cheese and pasta kit.

Eberjey William Jersey Knit Pajamas

Upgrade his sleepwear collection with Eberjey’s undeniably soft PJs that come in a multitude of colors.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Uncommon Originals Book Nook™ Reading Valet

If he’s a bookworm, make it easier for him to cuddle up with his favorite read with a sleek valet that has space for his glasses and coffee, too.

Jo Malone Jo Malone London

What’s better than one cologne? How about three scents that he can also keep in his gym bag or pack when he’s traveling?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Nike Lunar Force 1 Duck Boot

Here’s a sneaker that gives new meaning to the term fancy feet, thanks to spiked studs and a leather finish.

Unlock the Whiskey Escape Room

He’ll have to do a little bit of work to unlock this bottle from its cage. It’s a fun game that will turn any party into an amusing evening.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Balenciaga Ledger Stax™ Holder in Black

If he’s always misplacing his keys, he’ll never let Balenciaga’s keychain, adorned with the Eiffel Tower and a money holder, out of his sight.

Dents Cambridge Cashmere Lined Deerskin Gloves

With these sleek leather gloves, he’ll feel just as suave as James Bond.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

J.Crew Brushed Wool V-Neck Sweater

A cheerful sweater always makes for the perfect gift. This one earns bonus points thanks to its brushed feathery texture.

Jack Black Skin Savors Set

He deserves to be pampered, and Jack Black’s set will give his skin the extra love and care it’s craving.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

FoundRae Dream 18kt gold chain bracelet with onyx

When it comes to cool jewelry, the FoundRae brand is a purveyor of covetable pieces that stand out. Wrap this up and you’ll be on his good list forever.

Chanel Bleu De Chanel Eau de Toilette Spray

Here’s a heroic scent that will never disappoint during the holiday season.
